title: Why not make a runes for support?
body:
Runes that increase heal and shield amount, so there is more protection on allies.
What do you think ?

replies.body:
They would only be relevant late game, to be useful early they would have to be a high %, but that would make them op late.

If they did make it it would be a flat value like +12 or something seals

pretty sure nobody would use them. Early durability and dueling stats matter alot more to the lane, especially before everyone gets a full set of spells, since at this point, basically everyone starts even and anyone can 1v1 anyone else. Same reason gold/s runes and energy regen runes are considered a waste of ip.

Eh i wouldn't say Gold/S Rune's are a waste of IP they will likely come back into the meta when the game slows down a bit again.

And personally i run them on my thresh runes because i take Armor marks to take Gold/S Quint's (but that is a massive tradeoff).
Rune's are meant for early game stats, and especially with how much the game snowballs, you would be taking them and losing lane with them, and have a higher chance of losing the game.
